name: Simplified Baidu Pan
description: 精简百度云文件下载页面
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?"),
url-prefix("http://yun.baidu.com/share/link?"),
url-prefix("http://pan.baidu.com/s/"),
url-prefix("http://yun.baidu.com/s/")
{

#departForAd,
#share_ad_info_panl,
.slide-show-other-cns,
dl.hot,
dl.hotrec-ele,
dl#interestRect,
#shareqr,
.tousu_link,
.comment_panel,
footer,
.share-infos > span.seprate
{ display:none !important; }

.share-infos > span:first-child
{ position: absolute; right: 20px; font-size: 1.2em; }

}
